name: Hacker Tycoon: Simulator
description:
You want to be hacker number 1? Learn new technologies, conduct various hacks and create viruses!

Try not to fall under the suspicion of HBI and fight off attacks by other hackers.

Extract cryptocurrency and trade it on the exchange.

Improve farms for cryptocurrency mining and a server for faster tasks.

Carry out the tasks and get a big reward for it.
